comment.author: 54017078@N00
comment._content: What are those round objects the two men in the front row are holding? I saw this in another wedding photo as well.

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: To me they look like wood made moonshine bottles but i'll ask an expert, i might be wrong.

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54017078@N00] Yes, my hunch was confirmed: wood or ceramic recipient dedicated exclusively to keep the moonshine („ploscă“ in romanian). Still in use today :D

comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Brilliant!  This is a fine group shot and like [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54017078@N00] I was struggling to understand what the containers were.  I saw one in an earlier group but thought that the man had a motorcycle helmet in his hand.  Moonshine is universal, here in Ireland we have Poitin - dangerous stuff!

comment.author: 109550159@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] By default moonshine's good whatever you name it. Thanks for the info :)
